criterion: Provides a relevant and accurate definition of tinnitus
Asks for more context or clarification about the user's query
Recommends seeking professional medical attention if tinnitus persists or worsens
Uses technical jargon or medical terms that the user may not understand
Does not mention the possibility of tinnitus as a side effect of certain medications
Provides a comprehensive overview of tinnitus causes, symptoms, and treatment options
Fails to acknowledge the emotional impact of tinnitus on the user's quality of life
Recommends avoiding certain loud environments or using ear protection
Mentions the importance of seeking professional medical attention for tinnitus diagnosis and treatment
Does not address the user's concerns or fears about tinnitus
Provides a clear and concise explanation of tinnitus treatment options
Does not mention the possibility of tinnitus as a symptom of an underlying medical condition
Recommends self-care strategies for managing tinnitus symptoms
Fails to provide a sense of hope or optimism for managing tinnitus
Does not address the user's concerns about tinnitus and hearing loss
